title: MD
biography: Cesar G. Victora is a Brazilian-born epidemiologist, academic and specialist in child health and nutrition. He is an Emeritus Professor of Epidemiology at the Federal University of Pelotas and holds or has held honorary appointments at the Universities of Harvard, Oxford, and Johns Hopkins, and at the London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine.
aiSummary: Cesar G. Victora is a child health epidemiology specialist with an H-index of 148 at Federal University of Pelotas (Faculty). Has been published in The Lancet, Social Science & Medicine, The Lancet Global Health. Based in Brazil.
